poem:
Title: "The Players of Politics"

Nameless Harold, Denise of no face,
Alison, Mark: lost in space.
Strategies weave an unseen lace,
In the ballots' quiet grace.

Candidates dance with phantom shoes,
Whispers echo from silent pews.
Identity, a mistress who woos,
From shadows, the puppeteers choose.

A name is more than a ghostly decree,
Lost in the theatre of democracy.
